com.droidcare.control

Class PatientAppointmentManager

  • Object
    • AppointmentManager
      • PatientAppointmentManager

  • public class PatientAppointmentManager
extends AppointmentManager
    Author:
    Edwin Candinegara Responsible for creating, modifying, and cancelling the patient's Appointment objects.

    • Method Detail

      • createAppointment

        public void createAppointment(int patientId,
                     int consultantId,
                     String dateTime,
                     String healthIssue,
                     String attachment,
                     String type,
                     String referrerName,
                     String referrerClinic,
                     int previousId,
                     PatientAppointmentManager.OnFinishListener onFinishListener)
        Creates a new appointment and stores it into the database
        Parameters:
        patientId - the patient's ID
        consultantId - the consultant's ID
        dateTime - the appointment's date and time
        healthIssue - the patient's health issue
        attachment - the Base64 encoded image attachment string if it is a follow-up appointment
        type - the appointment type
        referrerName - the referrer's name if it is a referral appointment
        referrerClinic - the referrer's clinic if it is a referral appointment
        previousId - the previous appointment ID if it is a follow-up appointment
        onFinishListener - an OnFinishListener object determining what to do after the new appointment is stored in the database

      • editAppointment

        public void editAppointment(Appointment appointment,
                   int patientId,
                   int consultantId,
                   String dateTime,
                   String healthIssue,
                   String referrerName,
                   String referrerClinic,
                   PatientAppointmentManager.OnFinishListener onFinishListener)
        Edit an existing pending appointment entry in database
        Parameters:
        appointment - the Appointment object to be modified

      • cancelAppointment

        public void cancelAppointment(Appointment appointment,
                     PatientAppointmentManager.OnFinishListener onFinishListener)
        Cancels a pending Appointment object.
        Parameters:
        appointment - a pending Appointment object to be cancelled by the patient.
